metadata.name: Happy New Year #1/50
metadata.description:
Dear friends, we are living the last days and hours of this year and are approaching the New Year. There are no easy or difficult, successful or unsuccessful, good or bad years. What this year was and what the next one will be depends on all of us together and on each of us individually. 
Let our mistakes, troubles and sorrows remain in this year. And let us go into the New Year with open hearts and bright thoughts, full of ideas, strength and hopes. Let's make every effort to make the coming year successful, joyful and interesting, and let's make each other happy. I congratulate everyone with the coming New Year!
